meanings.definition: Make (an idea, situation, or problem) clear to someone by describing it in more detail.
meanings.sent1: She explains the math problem to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He always explains things in a simple way.
meanings.sent3: The robot explains how to brush your teeth in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: Her smile explains her happiness better than words.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explains the science experiment with colorful diagrams.

meanings.definition: Give a reason or justification for (an action or event).
meanings.sent1: He explains why he was late to school.
meanings.sent2: She explains the importance of recycling to her students.
meanings.sent3: The cat explains why it knocked over the vase - it was chasing a bug!
meanings.sent4: His tired face explains the long hours he worked.
meanings.sent5: The detective explains the motive behind the crime with solid evidence.
